main event: A sighting of a small object, about the size of a dime, occurred in Sonoma, California, on 30 March 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 30 seconds., The sighting featured both ground and air visual observations., Witness described the object as the size of a dime held at arm's length., The object moved or dipped in different directions but was not seen again., The investigation concluded that it was possibly a balloon.
sighted object: one object the size of a dime
